name: Amherst College
children: Amherst College is "need blind" for all international students.

name: Babson College
children:
Global Scholarship - Full Tuition, 
Diversity Leadership Award - Full Tuition, 
Weissman Scholarship Full Tuition, 
Arthur M. Blank Scholarship - Full Tuition

name: Bard College
children: Need Aware Full Tuition Financial Aid (only for "international student who can demonstrate sufficient funding to cover room, board and travel costs").

name: Barnard College (Women's Only College)
children: Barnard College awards a small number of need-based scholarships for international students in each first-year entering class.

name: Barry University
children: Stamps Scholarship: The Barry Stamps Scholars Program provides full tuition and room and board over four years, plus funds for study abroad, undergraduate research, and other exceptional learning experiences.

name: Bates College
children: Bates meets the full demonstrated financial need for all admitted students

name: Berea College
children: Financial aid and Scholarships cover all the costs of tuition, room, board, and fees.

name: Bowdoin College
children: Bowdoin meets all admitted international students' full demonstrated need with a small on-campus work expectation and scholarships.

name: Brown University
children: Brown meets full demonstrated need for students who are admitted. Brown will be need-blind for international students beginning with the Class of 2029.
